titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3861) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide extended and additional protection to Medicare beneficiaries who enroll for the Medicare prescription drug benefit during 2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Herseth. Petition No: 109-10.

bill.summary: 12/6/2005--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3861) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide extended and additional protection to Medicare beneficiaries who enroll for the Medicare prescription drug benefit during 2006.
